display_name: Filtered: Overall RDI at 4% desat or arousal
description: RDI with Arousals at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hremba4 +hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 +carba4+ caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 + oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 + marbpa4 + maropa4 + manrbpa4 + manropa4) / slpprdp
